name: Forest Bump
description:
Using W,A,S,D keys to control your car, you can explore the vast beauty of this magnificent terrain by collecting stars and finding glitched ninjas on the way hahaha. 

The Left click of your mouse also acts as a handbrake and the Spacebar is used to make the car jump. Enjoy!

PS: This is my first time designing a level using terrains. Hope you guys like it. I worked on this one real hard. Thank you:)
